oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-04-02 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 2, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Patsy Cline (who recently joined the Opry cast), and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Floyd Cramer. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1069th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price; Archie Campbell; Tommy Jackson; Patsy Cline; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ray Price -- I Told You So (Ray Price) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Ray Price, Tommy Jackson) -- Ray Price introduces Patsy Cline -- Lovesick Blues (Patsy Cline) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Tommy Jackson -- Tennessee Wagoner (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ray Price and Grant Turner talk -- Rock Of Ages (Ray Price, Jordanaires)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jordanaires (Musical group); Atkins, Chet; Cramer, Floyd, 1933-1997; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Cline, Patsy, 1932-1963
